channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sterling Might be Driven by External Factors For Now, Could Fall Later
item.description: Sterling was down against the dollar and Monex Europe said limited near-term macroeconomic drivers that could change interest-rate expectations leave ...

item.title: Germany's Thyssenkrupp pops 10% after narrowing net loss and booking $1 billion impairment charge
item.description: Thyssenkrupp on Tuesday reported a 1-billion-euro ($1 billion) impairment on its struggling steel division.

item.title: Your Junk Is Needed for the New Electric Era
item.description: In remote Quebec, mining giant Glencore is turning Americaâ€™s electronic trash back into treasure.

item.title: Wall Street analysts tout our 2 cybersecurity stocks ahead of quarterly earnings
item.description: Evercore ISI and Truist lifted Palo Alto Network's price target. Morgan Stanley forecasted more upside for CrowdStrike.

item.title: Target shares plunge 20% after discounter cuts forecast, posts biggest earnings miss in two years
item.description: Target missed on earnings and revenue even as it cut prices on thousands of items, including milk, diapers and toys, to try to attract discerning shop...

item.title: Walmart hikes its outlook again as shoppers spend more outside the grocery aisles
item.description: The discounter will deliver its latest sales results as inflation cools and the holiday season heats up.

item.title: Gold Futures Tick Down as Positive Momentum Arrested by Stronger Dollar
item.description: Gold futures edged lower, reflecting rising Treasury yields and a stronger dollar, as investors appear to have shifted focus back to the incoming Trum...

item.title: Futures Move Higher as Nvidia Earnings Loom
item.description: Futures tied to major U.S. markets ticked higher while overseas markets also rose.

item.title: Eurozone Bonds Could Face Headwinds on Better Risk Sentiment, Data
item.description: Bund yields were higher in early European trading and Commerzbank Research said risk-off dynamics were fading, although the underlying safety bid in G...

item.title: Lowe's beats on earnings and hikes guidance, but still expects sales to fall this year
item.description: Lowe's topped quarterly earnings and revenue estimates, but even its raised sales outlook would be a decline from last year.
